select unconfirm_id, ip_number, ip_status, ip_remarks, ip_address, ip_subnetmask, ip_addressnumber, ip_usetime, ip_username, ip_vlan, ip_connectingdevice, ip_port, ip_rate, ip_attribution, ip_broadbandacceptancenumber, ip_SNnumber, ip_OLTaddress, ip_IOMusername, ip_installedaddress, ip_type, ip_WOTVBSSremarks, ip_outputrate, ip_inputrate, ip_terminalnumber,unconfirm_status,submitter from unconfirmip
and ip_address like concat('%',concat(#{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
order by ip_address
